General.Name: Caisse Régionale de Crédit Agricole Mutuel de Paris et d'Ile-de-France
General.Description: Caisse Régionale de Crédit Agricole Mutuel de Paris et d'Ile-de-France, a cooperative bank, provides banking services to its members in France, Other European Union countries, North America, Central and South America, Africa and the Middle East, Asia and Oceania, and Japan. The company provides financial saving services, that includes monetary, bond, and securities; life insurance investment services; and distributes housing and consumption loans, non-life and provident insurance products, and life insurance products. It serves individuals, farmers, professionals, businesses, and local communities. The company was formed in 1901 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Caisse Régionale de Crédit Agricole Mutuel de Paris et d'Ile-de-France is a subsidiary of Crédit Agricole S.A.
General.Address: 26 quai de la Râpée, Paris, France, 75012
